rule.description: Use of a broken or weak cryptographic hashing algorithm on sensitive data
rule.name: py/weak-sensitive-data-hashing

message.text: Sensitive data (password) is used in a hashing algorithm (MD5) that is insecure for password hashing, since it is not a computationally expensive hash function.

rule.description: Use of a broken or weak cryptographic hashing algorithm on sensitive data
